mealText: Healthy smoothie, a nutritious morning choice.
description: Fluffy Pancakes: Light and airy pancakes topped with fresh berries and a drizzle of maple syrup, the perfect morning indulgence.

mealText: Warm oatmeal, a comforting start everyday.
description: Avocado Toast: Toasted sourdough topped with creamy avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of tangy feta, a nutritious and satisfying breakfast option.

mealText: Omelette filled with veggies, a delight.
description: Classic Omelette: Fluffy eggs folded over a filling of sautéed vegetables and melted cheese, a savory and protein-packed breakfast choice.

mealText: Crispy bacon, eggs, toast—classic breakfast combo.
description: Yogurt Parfait: Layers of Greek yogurt, crunchy granola, and seasonal fruits, a refreshing and wholesome start to the day.

mealText: Crispy bacon, eggs, toast—classic breakfast combo.
description: Breakfast Burrito: Scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, and melted cheese wrapped in a warm tortilla, a hearty and portable morning treat.

mealText: Crispy bacon, eggs, toast—classic breakfast combo.
description: Fresh Fruit Bowl: A vibrant assortment of sliced fruits, including juicy watermelon, ripe berries, and sweet pineapple, a colorful and vitamin-rich breakfast delight.
